Nobody Is Listening // 1.15.21 // Pre-Order: https://smarturl.it/zNIL 
🎧Put your headphones on to listen in immersive 360 Reality Audio🎧

Producer: Matthew Kauth
Production Company: London Alley Entertainment Inc.
 
Watch the official video for “Better”: https://smarturl.it/xBetterx/youtube 
Listen to more music from Zayn: https://zayn.lnk.to/listenYD 
 
“Vibez” was mixed with an immersive #360RA experience in mind, use headphones for the full effect.
Stream “Vibez” in full 360 Reality Audio, now available on Tidal, Amazon and Deezer.

___

“Vibez”

Don’t keep me waiting 
I’ve been waiting all night to get closer
And you already know I got it for ya
You know the vibes, know the vibes
Put it on ya 
If we’re moving too fast we can slow up 
Baby, this far from mediocre no 
You know the vibes, know the vibes
 
It’s you and me 
Here in this room 
Imagining things we could do 
Won’t tell no lies, no lies to you 
I need you here, I need you here 
Mind running wild 
We touching slow 
Just say the word, I’m ready to go 
Anticipation plays after 4 
I need you now oh 
 
Baby I’mma get you right, I will 
When I touch you tell me how it feel 
Trust me, I’mma make it feel surreal 
Baby Mind Of Mine 
I’mma do all the things 
Type of things that happen in your dreams 
Get you right where you need to be 
Just don't keep me
 
Don't keep me waiting 
I’ve been waiting all night to get closer 
And you already know I got it for ya
You know the vibes, know the vibes 
Put it on ya 
If we’re moving too fast, we could slow up 
Baby, this far from mediocre no 
You got the vibes, got the vibes 
 
Baby I’mma get you right, I will
When I touch you tell me how it feel 
Trust me, I’mma make it feel surreal
Baby Mind of Mine
I’mma do all the things 
Type of things that happen in your dreams
Get you right where you need to be 
Just don't keep me 
 
Don’t keep me waiting 
I’ve been waiting all night to get closer 
Yeah you already know I got it for ya
You know the vibes, know the vibes
Put it on ya
If were moving to fast, we could slow up 
Baby, this far from mediocre no 
You got the vibes, got the vibes

#zayn #vibez #360RA

流“Vibez”在完整的360现实音频，现在可以在潮汐，亚马逊和Deezer。

“Vibez”

别让我等太久
我整晚都在等着走近
你已经知道我是为你买的
你知道那种感觉，知道那种感觉
把它戴在你身上
如果我们走得太快，我们可能会放慢速度
宝贝，这远不是平庸不是
你知道那种感觉，知道那种感觉

只有你和我
就在这个房间里
想象我们可以做的事情
不会对你撒谎，不会对你撒谎
我需要你在这里，我需要你在这里
心灵狂野奔跑
我们慢慢地接触
只要说一句话，我就可以走了
预期在4点之后播放
我现在需要你哦

宝贝，我会让你重回正轨，我会的
当我触摸你的时候，告诉我那是什么感觉
相信我，我会让它感觉超现实的
我的宝贝思想
我要做所有的事
梦中发生的事情类型
把你带到你想去的地方
别把我留在这里

别让我等太久
我整晚都在等着走近
你已经知道我是为你买的
你知道那种感觉，知道那种感觉
把它戴在你身上
如果我们走得太快，我们可能会减速
宝贝，这远不是平庸不是
你有共鸣，有共鸣

宝贝，我会让你重回正轨，我会的
当我触摸你的时候，告诉我那是什么感觉
相信我，我会让它感觉超现实的
我的宝贝思想
我要做所有的事
梦中发生的事情类型
把你带到你想去的地方
别把我留在这里

别让我等太久
我整晚都在等着走近
是啊，你已经知道我是为你买的

previous.excerpt:
I finally pulled the trigger on an electric car...


This is the Porsche Taycan Turbo S. It was a tough choice between this and a Tesla (both are awesome cars). The Tesla has a lot more in terms of autonomous tech/software where the Taycan leans into Porsche's racing heritage/feel. The Taycan Turbo S is likely a touch faster around a race track compared to Tesla's current performance model as well (if that matters to you).

Porsche North Toronto
Insta - https://www.instagram.com/PorscheNorthToronto/
Youtube - https://youtube.com/c/PorscheCentreNorthToronto

FOLLOW ME IN THESE PLACES FOR UPDATES
Twitter - http://twitter.com/unboxtherapy
Facebook - http://facebook.com/lewis.hilsenteger
Instagram - http://instagram.com/unboxtherapy
previous.title: I Finally Bought an Electric Car...

localize.title: 我终于买了一辆电动车。
localize.description:
我终于扣动了一辆电动车的扳机。


这是保时捷泰康涡轮增压S，这是一个艰难的选择，这和特斯拉(两者都是很棒的车)。特斯拉在自动驾驶技术/软件方面有更多的优势，其中泰坎倾向于保时捷的赛车传统/感觉。与特斯拉目前的性能车型相比，泰坎Turbo S在赛道上的速度可能会更快一些(如果这对你很重要)。

保时捷北多伦多
Insta-https://www.instagram.com/PorscheNorthToronto/
Youtube-https://youtube.com/c/PorscheCentreNorthToronto

在这些地方关注我以获取更新
推特-http://twitter.com/unboxtherapy
facebook-http://facebook.com/lewis.hilsenteger
Instagram-http://instagram.com/unboxtherapy

localize.title: 我終於買了一輛電動車。
localize.description:
我終於扣動了一輛電動車的扳機。


這是保時捷泰康渦輪增壓S，這是一個艱難的選擇，這和特斯拉(兩者都是很棒的車)。特斯拉在自動駕駛技術/軟件方面有更多的優勢，其中泰坎傾向於保時捷的賽車傳統/感覺。與特斯拉目前的性能車型相比，泰坎Turbo S在賽道上的速度可能會更快一些(如果這對你很重要)。

保時捷北多倫多
Insta-https://www.instagram.com/PorscheNorthToronto/
Youtube-https://youtube.com/c/PorscheCentreNorthToronto

在這些地方關注我以獲取更新
推特-http://twitter.com/unboxtherapy
facebook-http://facebook.com/lewis.hilsenteger
Instagram-http://instagram.com/unboxtherapy

next.excerpt:
The woman who was seen on video falsely accusing acclaimed jazz musician Keyon Herrold’s son of stealing her phone in a New York City hotel last month has been arrested outside of Los Angeles, police said. NBC New York’s Katherine Creag reports.

#NewYorkCity
#KeyonHarrold
#LosAngeles
next.title: Woman Arrested Who Falsely Accused Black Teen of Stealing Phone at NYC Hotel | NBC New York

localize.title: 一名女子被捕，她错误地指控黑人青少年在NYC酒店|NBC纽约窃取手机
localize.description:
警方称，视频中错误指控著名爵士乐演奏家凯扬·赫罗尔德的儿子上个月在纽约市一家酒店偷了她的手机的女子已在洛杉矶郊外被捕。NBC纽约的凯瑟琳·克里格将带来报道。

#纽约市 
#KeyonHarrold 
#洛杉矶

localize.title: 一名女子被捕，她錯誤地指控黑人青少年在NYC酒店|NBC紐約竊取手機
localize.description:
警方稱，視頻中錯誤指控著名爵士樂演奏家凱揚·赫羅爾德的兒子上個月在紐約市一家酒店偷了她的手機的女子已在洛杉磯郊外被捕。NBC紐約的凱瑟琳·克里格將帶來報道。

#紐約市 
#KeyonHarrold 
#洛杉磯
